title: Abelian duality in three dimensions
abstract: Abelian duality on the closed three-dimensional Riemannian manifold M is discussed. Partition functions for the ordinary U(1) gauge theory and circle-valued scalar field theory on M are explicitly calculated and compared. Keywords: Abelian duality, three-dimensional Abelian gauge theory, circle-valued scalar free field theory, quantum field theory on Riemannian manifold.
